name: Open GitHub and Search Repo
task: Go to https://github.com, use the search bar to look up 'python/cpython', and open the repository page.

name: Check Jenkins Build Status
task: Visit a public Jenkins demo at https://builds.apache.org, locate the Accumulo job, and read the latest build status and give a summary about it.

name: Find Python Docs Example
task: Go to geekforgeeks and search for python string section, copy the code examples and paste in a google docs file.

name: Kaggle Oauth Signin
task: Visit kaggle, signin using google oauth and gather information about ongoing competitions and find the competition with higher prize pool and sign out of the account after completing the task

name: Extract Stack Overflow Top Answer
task: Search 'python list comprehension' on https://stackoverflow.com, open the top question, and copy the top answer's code block and paste it in a google docs file.

name: Web Elements testing
task: Go to https://demoqa.com/elements, test all the available elements in the elements tab and give the elements failed to use'.

name: Submit Registration Form
task: Open https://vinothqaacademy.com/demo-site/, fill in all the elements in registration form also scroll to view all the fields, and submit the form.

name: Sign up demo
task: visit https://demoqa.com/automation-practice-form and fill in all the fields in the form and submit the form, also check if the form is submitted successfully.

name: add products to cart
task: Go to https://www.automationexercise.com/, add any 3 products to cart and confirm the products are added to cart.

name: Draggable element Test
task: Visit https://letcode.in/draggable, drag the element inside the dotted area.

name: Download file from URL
task: visit https://letcode.in/file and download all the three types of files.

name: Slider test
task: Visit https://letcode.in/slider, follow the instructions in the todo in the page.

name: review writing
task: Go to https://www.automationexercise.com/ and go to any product and write a review, if needed to be signed in do a sign in.

name: Add and remove elements
task: Visit https://the-internet.herokuapp.com/add_remove_elements/, add 10 elements and remove 5 elements.

name: Add item below 50$ to cart
task: Go to https://magento.softwaretestingboard.com/, add a travel bag within 50$ price also choose the highly rated bag.

name: Open Google Calendar Public Page
task: Visit https://calendar.google.com/calendar/embed?src=en.indian%23holiday%40group.v.calendar.google.com and read all the festivals and holidays in this month.

name: Web Elements testing
task: Visit https://letcode.in/test and test all types of inputs, button, slider and windows and give a summary about the test.

name: Check Package on PyPI
task: Open https://pypi.org/project/requests/, and copy the latest version number displayed.

name: bank manager login
task: Visit https://www.globalsqa.com/angularJs-protractor/BankingProject/#/login, login as bank manager and add a customer with name 'John Doe', '12345', 'London' and '1234567890' and verify the customer is added, also proceed with openning account for that new customer

name: Bank Deposit and Withdrawal
task: Visit https://www.globalsqa.com/angularJs-protractor/BankingProject/#/login,login as harry potter and deposit 2000 and withdraw 500 and finally get the account balance and logout.

name: Google Search
task: Go to https://www.google.com
